## Issue First Policy

**PRs without a linked issue will be closed immediately.**

Before opening a PR:
1. Open an issue describing the problem or feature
2. Wait for discussion and approval
3. Reference the issue in your PR

## Linked Issue

Closes #<!-- issue number -->

## Checklist

- [ ] I opened an issue first and it was approved
- [ ] Tests pass (`make test`)
- [ ] Code follows project conventions
